name: Chapter 12: Ethical Dilemmas
short_description: Sarah faces ethical dilemmas as the implications of magi tech become apparent. She must decide between furthering her innovations and considering the potential consequences on society.
people: Sarah Davis, her allies, ethical advisors
to_next_chapter: Sarah makes a decision about the future of magi tech.

beats.long_title: Sarah Reflects on the Potential Impact of Magi Tech
beats.description: Sarah recognizes the manifold impacts her inventions might have on society, prompting a deep introspection about the ethical ramifications of her work.

beats.long_title: Sarah Meets with Ethical Advisors at the Academy
beats.description: To gain insight, Sarah arranges a meeting with ethical advisors at the Academy to understand the full breadth of the potential consequences of magi tech.
During the meeting, ethical advisors engage in a heated debate, presenting both the potential benefits and devastating consequences magi tech could impose on society.
Sarah’s closest allies share their perspectives, each offering a unique viewpoint on how to navigate the intricate balance between innovation and ethical considerations.

beats.long_title: Sarah Finds Herself Questioning Her Own Motivations
beats.description: Amidst the differing opinions, Sarah begins to question her own motivations and whether her pursuit of innovation is truly for the greater good.

beats.long_title: Review of Historical Cases with Similar Ethical Dilemmas
beats.description: Ethical advisors present historical case studies where advancements led to ethical dilemmas, providing Sarah with precedents that further complicate her decision-making process.

beats.long_title: Suggestion to Halt Magi Tech Development Temporarily
beats.description: One of the ethical advisors proposes a temporary moratorium on magi tech development, suggesting further study and consideration before proceeding.

beats.long_title: Imagining a Future with Magi Tech
beats.description: Sarah envisions a future where magi tech is fully integrated into society, weighing the fantastical benefits against potential societal disruptions.

beats.long_title: Acknowledging the Sacrifices and Risks Involved
beats.description: Realizing that progress often comes with sacrifices, Sarah is forced to weigh the potential risks and costs associated with her innovations.

beats.long_title: Sarah Decides on the Future Path of Magi Tech
beats.description: After much deliberation and taking into account all arguments, Sarah makes a pivotal decision about the future of magi tech, setting the stage for the events in the next chapter.
